title: How to Convert AVCHD Video to MP4 Using VLC Media Player

steps.headline: Click the Media button on the top left corner in VLC.
Use the Add button to add what you want to convert.
steps.description: Choose one or more files and then click Convert/Save.

steps.headline: Choose the output format MP4 from Profile.
steps.description: There are also other choice for specific devices like iPhone/iPad/Android.

steps.headline: Click Browse to choose the Destination file and rename the file.
Click Start to convert your AVCHD video to MP4.

text: Open your VLC Media Player.  Click the Media button on the top left corner in VLC. Then click Convert/Save. Use the Add button to add what you want to convert. Choose one or more files and then click Convert/Save. Choose the output format MP4 from Profile. There are also other choice for specific devices like iPhone/iPad/Android. Click Browse to choose the Destination file and rename the file.  Click Start to convert your AVCHD video to MP4.
